```{=html}
<script>
const map = L.map("forecast-map", {
  center: [50.56, -4.05],
  zoom: 8,
  zoomControl: true,
  scrollWheelZoom: false,
});

L.tileLayer("https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png", {
  attribution:
    '&copy; <a href="https://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright">OpenStreetMap</a> contributors',
  maxZoom: 18,
}).addTo(map);

const markerLayer = L.layerGroup().addTo(map);
const slider = document.getElementById("time-slider");
const timeLabel = document.getElementById("time-label");
const timeHint = document.getElementById("time-hint");
const chartTitle = document.getElementById("chart-title");
const chartHint = document.getElementById("chart-hint");
const chartCanvas = document.getElementById("score-chart");

const RAG_COLOURS = {
  Green: "#2ecc71",
  Amber: "#f1c40f",
  Red: "#e74c3c",
};

const dataUrl = "data/forecast.json";
const THREE_DAYS_MS = 3 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000;
let timeBuckets = [];
let forecastEntries = [];
let scoreChart = null;
let selectedTimeMs = null;
let currentChartLocation = null;

const selectedTimePlugin = {
  id: "selectedTime",
  afterDatasetsDraw(chart, _args, opts) {
    if (typeof selectedTimeMs !== "number") {
      return;
    }

    const timestamps = opts?.timestamps;
    if (!Array.isArray(timestamps) || !timestamps.length) {
      return;
    }

    const selectedIndex = timestamps.findIndex((ms) => ms === selectedTimeMs);
    if (selectedIndex === -1) {
      return;
    }

    const xScale = chart.scales?.x;
    const labels = chart.data?.labels;
    if (!xScale || !labels || typeof labels[selectedIndex] === "undefined") {
      return;
    }

    const area = chart.chartArea;
    if (!area) {
      return;
    }

    const xPos = xScale.getPixelForValue(labels[selectedIndex]);
    const { top, bottom } = area;
    const ctx = chart.ctx;
    ctx.save();
    ctx.strokeStyle = opts?.color || "#c0392b";
    ctx.lineWidth = opts?.lineWidth || 2;
    ctx.setLineDash(opts?.dash || [6, 6]);
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(xPos, top);
    ctx.lineTo(xPos, bottom);
    ctx.stroke();
    ctx.restore();
  },
};

Chart.register(selectedTimePlugin);

const formatTimestamp = (ms) =>
  new Date(ms).toLocaleString(undefined, {
    weekday: "short",
    day: "2-digit",
    month: "short",
    hour: "2-digit",
    minute: "2-digit",
  });

const buildTimestamp = (entry) => {
  const base = `${entry.date}T${entry.period === "morning" ? "06:00:00" : "15:00:00"}`;
  return new Date(base);
};

const normalizeScore = (value) =>
  typeof value === "number" && !Number.isNaN(value) ? value : null;

const pickScore = (...values) => {
  for (const value of values) {
    const normalized = normalizeScore(value);
    if (normalized !== null) {
      return normalized;
    }
  }
  return null;
};

const formatLocationLabel = (slug = "") =>
  slug
    .replace(/_/g, " ")
    .replace(/\b\w/g, (char) => char.toUpperCase());

const getVisScore = (entry) => pickScore(entry.vis_score);

const getWindScore = (entry) => pickScore(entry.wind_score, entry.score_wind);

const getRainScore = (entry) => pickScore(entry.rain_score, entry.score_rain);

const formatScoreLabel = (score) =>
  typeof score === "number" && !Number.isNaN(score) ? score.toFixed(2) : "N/A";

const renderScoreChart = (locationName) => {
  if (!chartCanvas) {
    return;
  }

  const locationEntries = forecastEntries
    .filter((entry) => entry.location_name === locationName)
    .sort((a, b) => a.timestamp.getTime() - b.timestamp.getTime());

  if (!locationEntries.length) {
    currentChartLocation = null;
    chartTitle.textContent = "Site score trends";
    chartHint.textContent = "No historical values could be found for this site.";
    if (scoreChart) {
      scoreChart.destroy();
      scoreChart = null;
    }
    return;
  }

  currentChartLocation = locationName;
  const labels = locationEntries.map((entry) => formatTimestamp(entry.timestamp.getTime()));
  const timestamps = locationEntries.map((entry) => entry.timestamp.getTime());
  const visData = locationEntries.map((entry) => getVisScore(entry));
  const windData = locationEntries.map((entry) => getWindScore(entry));
  const rainData = locationEntries.map((entry) => getRainScore(entry));

  const datasets = [
    {
      label: "VIS Score",
      data: visData,
      borderColor: "#8e44ad",
      backgroundColor: "rgba(142, 68, 173, 0.2)",
      tension: 0.35,
      fill: false,
      spanGaps: true,
      pointRadius: 3,
    },
    {
      label: "Wind Score",
      data: windData,
      borderColor: "#2980b9",
      backgroundColor: "rgba(41, 128, 185, 0.2)",
      tension: 0.35,
      fill: false,
      spanGaps: true,
      pointRadius: 3,
    },
    {
      label: "Rain Score",
      data: rainData,
      borderColor: "#e67e22",
      backgroundColor: "rgba(230, 126, 34, 0.2)",
      tension: 0.35,
      fill: false,
      spanGaps: true,
      pointRadius: 3,
    },
  ];

  const selectedLineOptions = {
    timestamps,
    color: "#c0392b",
    dash: [6, 6],
    lineWidth: 2,
  };

  if (scoreChart) {
    scoreChart.destroy();
    scoreChart = null;
  }

  scoreChart = new Chart(chartCanvas, {
    type: "line",
    data: {
      labels,
      datasets,
    },
    options: {
      responsive: true,
      maintainAspectRatio: false,
      animation: false,
      interaction: {
        mode: "index",
        intersect: false,
      },
      scales: {
        y: {
          min: 0,
          max: 1,
          title: { display: true, text: "Score" },
        },
        x: {
          ticks: { autoSkip: true },
        },
      },
      plugins: {
        legend: { position: "bottom" },
        selectedTime: selectedLineOptions,
      },
    },
  });

  chartTitle.textContent = `Site score trends for ${formatLocationLabel(locationName)}`;
  chartHint.textContent = `Showing ${locationEntries.length} forecast points`;
};

const renderMarkers = (timeMs) => {
  markerLayer.clearLayers();
  selectedTimeMs = timeMs;
  const selected = forecastEntries.filter(
    (entry) => entry.timestamp.getTime() === timeMs
  );

  if (!selected.length) {
    timeLabel.textContent = "No forecast entries available for this time.";
    return;
  }

  timeLabel.textContent = `Forecast for ${formatTimestamp(timeMs)}`;

  selected.forEach((entry) => {
    const color = RAG_COLOURS[entry.vis_rag] || "#95a5a6";
    const circle = L.circleMarker([entry.latitude, entry.longitude], {
      radius: 14,
      stroke: false,
      fillColor: color,
      fillOpacity: 0.85,
    });
    const popup = `
      <strong>${entry.location_name}</strong><br/>
      ${entry.vis_rag} (score: ${formatScoreLabel(entry.vis_score)})
    `;
    circle.bindPopup(popup);
    circle.on("click", () => renderScoreChart(entry.location_name));
    circle.addTo(markerLayer);
  });

  if (currentChartLocation) {
    renderScoreChart(currentChartLocation);
  }
};

fetch(dataUrl)
  .then((response) => {
    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}`);
    }
    return response.text();
  })
  .then((rawText) => {
    const sanitized = rawText.replace(/\bNaN\b/g, "null");
    try {
      return JSON.parse(sanitized);
    } catch (parseError) {
      console.error("Failed to parse forecast JSON", parseError);
      throw parseError;
    }
  })
  .then((data) => {
    console.log("Raw data from forecast.json:", data);
    if (!Array.isArray(data) || data.length === 0) {
      timeLabel.textContent = "No forecast data available.";
      return;
    }

    forecastEntries = data
      .map((entry) => ({
        ...entry,
        timestamp: buildTimestamp(entry),
      }))
      .filter(
        (entry) =>
          entry.timestamp instanceof Date &&
          !Number.isNaN(entry.timestamp.getTime()) &&
          typeof entry.latitude === "number" &&
          typeof entry.longitude === "number"
      );
    console.log("Parsed entries:", forecastEntries.length);

    if (!forecastEntries.length) {
      timeLabel.textContent = "Unable to parse forecast timestamps.";
      return;
    }

    const bounds = forecastEntries.reduce((acc, entry) => {
      if (!acc) {
        return L.latLngBounds([entry.latitude, entry.longitude], [entry.latitude, entry.longitude]);
      }
      return acc.extend([entry.latitude, entry.longitude]);
    }, null);
    if (bounds && bounds.isValid()) {
      map.fitBounds(bounds.pad(0.2));
    }

    const now = Date.now();
    const earliestAllowed = now - THREE_DAYS_MS;
    const allBuckets = Array.from(
      new Set(forecastEntries.map((entry) => entry.timestamp.getTime()))
    ).sort((a, b) => a - b);
    timeBuckets = allBuckets.filter((ms) => ms >= earliestAllowed);
    if (!timeBuckets.length) {
      timeLabel.textContent = "No forecast data within the last 3 days.";
      return;
    }
    console.log("Time buckets (<=3 days old):", timeBuckets);

    slider.min = 0;
    slider.max = timeBuckets.length - 1;

    const defaultIndex = timeBuckets.reduce(
      (closest, current, idx) => {
        const currentDelta = Math.abs(current - now);
        if (currentDelta < closest.delta) {
          return { idx, delta: currentDelta };
        }
        return closest;
      },
      { idx: 0, delta: Number.POSITIVE_INFINITY }
    ).idx;

    slider.value = defaultIndex;
    slider.disabled = false;
    timeHint.textContent = `${timeBuckets.length} available forecast slots`;

    renderMarkers(timeBuckets[defaultIndex]);
  })
  .catch((error) => {
    console.error("Failed to load forecast JSON", error);
    timeLabel.textContent = "Problem loading forecast data. Check the console for details.";
  });

slider.addEventListener("input", (event) => {
  const bucketIndex = Number(event.target.value);
  const targetTime = timeBuckets[bucketIndex];
  if (typeof targetTime === "number") {
    renderMarkers(targetTime);
  }
});
</script>
```
